App_name: What Is The Color Of Your Heart?
Result:
Red
                    Red is the color of fire and blood,so it is associated with energy,war,danger,strength,power,the determination as well as passion,desire,and love.you are energetic and passionate kind of person.

Wite
                  The Color white is the color at its most complete and pure,the color or perfection. You are innocent and pure kind of person.

Yellow
                  Yellow is the color of sunshine. It produces a warming effect,arouses cheerfulness,stimultes mental activity,and generates muscle energy.You are creative and fun loving person.

Green
                  Green is the color of nature and symbolizes growth,harmony,freshness,and fertility.You are peaceful and natural kind of person.

Blue
                   Blue is the color of trust and peace.It can suggest loyalty and integrity as well as conservatism and frigidity.You are very peaceful and calm kind of person.

Gold
                  The color is gold is the color of success,achievement,and triumph.you are wealthy and eye-catching kind of person.
Result_share:
Satish, your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. You always start a day with a grateful heart. Deep inside, you have a kind soul that shines brightly in this wonderful color. That's why this color reflects your best qualities as well.
                    Share your result so your friends can also find out which color their heart is!
